text: Hi, my name is Hyuk Lee,
Amazon DynamoDB Specialist SA.
My role is to reduce the learning curve when customers start using DynamoDB,
or to think about and solve various problems they encounter while using DynamoDB.
AWS introduces various features and tips of DynamoDB on YouTube
under the name Amazon DynamoDB Nuggets.
However, I think there are many people who missed it because it only has English content.
So, today I would like to summarize in Korean
what features Nuggets has covered so far.

including live shows on Twitch.

the concept of a specific feature in less than 10 minutes.

how is throttling determined in provisioned mode?

DynamoDB offers several backup options to choose from.
There are on-demand backup,
integration with AWS Backup, PITR, and S3 export/import,

By choosing backups that fit your different needs,
you can build cost-optimized backup/restore.
This video explains the criteria for selecting GSI and LSI.

This video explains how using SCAN may be more cost-effective
than pre-creating GSIs for infrequently accessed workloads.
If you are running a similar workload,

This video provides a brief explanation of on-demand mode

that must be implemented when opening a large-scale service.
